document.full_text: south sudan's army launched a fresh assault on rebels in a key oil-producing state, killing more than 80, a government minister said wednesday, in the latest violence ahead of the region's independence in july.
document.title: south sudan army kills 84 rebels: minister
lines_and_colors: south sudan's army launched a fresh assault on rebels in a key oil-producing state, killing more than 80, a government minister said wednesday, in the latest violence ahead of the region's independence in july.
